Building the daily schedule Building the continuation of the daily schedule You need to enter the meetings into the schedule according to the instructions. Tapping on a meeting will show the time. All activities must be placed in the calendar before continuing
Sunday Monday Tuesday Wednesday Thursday
09:00 10:00 11:00 12:00 13:00 14:00 15:00 16:00
Book Dumbbell Move Lecture Coffee Doctor
Take the grandchildren to a story hour at the library on Wednesday at 16:00 Exercise class at the community center on Sundays at 11:00 for one hour Go for a morning walk twice a week for at least one hour Attend a lecture on Thursday at 15:00 for one hour Social meeting at the cafe on Tuesdays at 11:00 for two hours Eye doctor appointment before Tuesday between 09:00–12:00 for one hour
Incoming Call Incoming Call Beit Rivka 052-538-1648 Thank you The task is completed, thank you very much for your cooperation
Memory Test The task takes about 20 minutes Instructions You must complete the task without interruptions Read the instructions to the end All tasks must be completed To hear the instructions, press Listen It is recommended to perform the task in a quiet room Good luck! To start the task, press Start
Room Screen Bedroom Living Room Kitchen Drag and place the seven objects in the three rooms as you would place them in your home. You must remember the location of the objects. When finished, press Continue.
I will remember everything Talk to the family Use the diary What will you do? Here is a schedule of activities. What should you do to remember all the listed activities? Rate your feelings How well do you think you will do in the upcoming task? Rate
